data.oai_dc:dc:
MHA Herbarium presents in GBIF collections from Moscow Region (Moscow City and Moscow Oblast). The collections were imaged by MHA staff members in 2019. The imaging of 40K specimens was supported by the research project 19-34-70018 funded by RFBR and Moscow city Government ("Flora of Moscow" Information System on Moscow Digital Herbarium web-platform).

Databasing (85%) and georeferencing (100%) of the Moscow specimens of MHA herbarium was perfomed in Lomonosov Moscow State University. The collection is fully available in Moscow Digital Herbarium (https://plant.depo.msu.ru/).

|49,622 occurrences
